verses.name: Matthew 10:28
verses.text: And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.

verses.name: Matthew 10:29
verses.text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father.

verses.name: Matthew 10:30
verses.text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered.

verses.name: Matthew 10:31
verses.text: Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.

verses.name: Matthew 10:32
verses.text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.
